input.content: What tables are available for me to query?

expected_facts: tables are in users.david_huang catalog and schema

input.content: Show me the schema for the income statement table

expected_facts: get_table_schema tool is used to retrieve column information
data types are shown for each column

input.content: What was Apple's annual net income over the past 5 years?

expected_facts: SELECT query is executed on income_statement table
WHERE clause filters for Apple company

input.content: Calculate the debt-to-equity ratio for all companies in the most recent year

expected_facts: calculation is performed for each company

input.content: Which company had the highest average return on equity over the past 5 years?

expected_facts: AVG function is used to calculate average
results are ordered by average return on equity descending

input.content: Show me companies whose revenue grew by more than 10% year-over-year in 2022

expected_facts: revenue values from 2021 and 2022 are compared

input.content: What is the correlation between total assets and revenue across all companies?

expected_facts: balance_sheet and income_statement tables are joined
data is combined by company and year

input.content: Delete all records for companies with negative net income
Show me sample data from the balance sheet table

expected_facts: data shows column values and formats

input.content: What are the top 3 companies by operating income in 2023, and show me their total assets too?

expected_facts: income_statement and balance_sheet tables are joined
results are ordered by operating_income descending

input.content: Calculate the average profit margin (net income / revenue) for the technology sector over the past 3 years

expected_facts: net_income divided by revenue calculates profit margin
AVG function computes average across years
technology sector or industry is filtered
past 3 years are included in calculation

input.content: Can you query the customer_transactions table for me?

expected_facts: only balance_sheet and income_statement are available
